name: Into The Light (itch) (Yorsh)
description:
Desktop version available at the bottom of the page if you have troubles with the web version.

They can't resist the call of the light, even though it will kill them. Eventually they will go into the light.

Try to distract them from the light, just a little bit longer...

Controls
  • Move with the cursor of the mouse.
  • Bite with left click or space (you must bite the human for it to do anything).
Objectives
  • Keep the mosquitoes alive, you loose after 3 deaths.
  • They die when touching a light.
  • They can be killed by Praying Mantis, scare them away by bumping into them.
  • You need energy to keep glowing, bite the human to recover your strenght.
  • You gain points by biting the human and surviving over time.
